Lyric:
[00:18.150]Return of the Mack, get up!
[00:22.490]What it is, what it does, what it is, what it isn’t.
[00:25.280]Looking for a better way to get up out of bed
[00:26.930]Instead of getting on the Internet and checking a new hit me
[00:27.830]Get up! Thrift shop pimp strut walking, little bit of humble, little bit of cautious
[00:30.090]Somewhere between like rocky and Cosby sweater gang nope nope y’all can’t copy
[00:33.690]Yup. Bad, moon walking, this here, is our party, my posse's been on Broadway,
[00:38.720]And we did it, our way.
[00:39.840]Grown music, I shed my skin and put my bones into everything I record to it
[00:44.590]And yet I’m on.
[00:45.930]Let that stage light go and shine on down, got that Bob Barker suit game and plinko in my style.
[00:52.520]Money, stay on my craft and stick around for those pounds,
[00:55.520]But I do that to pass the torch and put on for my town
[00:59.130]Trust me. On my I-N-D-E-P-E-N-D-E-N-T shit hustler,

[01:10.230]fat cat, crushing Labels out here,
